definition: Roh Moo-hyun (1946-2009), South Korean lawyer and politician, president 2003-2008
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Wu
martial/military
stick-like implement inserted into the handles of a tripod cauldron in ancient times in order to lift the cauldron/commonly used in Korean names, transcribed as "hyun"

sentences.english: It was the third time that Roh has offered condolences since Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这是周二以来卢武铉第三次发表吊慰之辞。

sentences.english: But in the past decade it has weakened under the successive administrations of Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun.
sentences.chinese: 但在过去十年，在金大中和卢武铉政府下遭到削弱。

sentences.english: Hu and Roh Moo-hyun also jointly met with journalists from the Chinese and ROK media.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛和卢武铉还共同会见了中韩媒体记者。

sentences.english: 'When he was in office, I was sometimes disappointed at him, ' Ms. Park said.
sentences.chinese: 她说，当卢武铉在台上时，我有时对他感到失望。

sentences.english: Supporters of Mr. Roh issued news releases denouncing Mr. Lee and prosecutors.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉的支持者发表新闻稿指责李明博和检察部门。

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun declared that the ROK acknowledges China's market economy status.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉宣布韩国承认中国的市场经济地位。

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun made highly positive comments on China's foreign policy of equality, mutual benefits and good-neighborliness towards neighboring countries.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉高度评价中国平等互利的睦邻周边外交政策。

sentences.english: The agreement, however, went missing during the Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun administrations.
sentences.chinese: 然而，该协议在金大中和卢武铉政府期间丢失了。

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun and his wife stepped forward to extend cordial greetings to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉和夫人迎上前去，向他们致以亲切问候。

sentences.english: People attend a funeral service for the former President Roh Moo-hyun at Roh's hometown Bonghwa village in Gimha.
sentences.chinese: 人们在前总统卢武铉的家乡庆尚峰下村参加他的葬礼。

sentences.english: Mr Roh , 62, was killed in a fall from a mountain near his home.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉今年62岁，从其家附近的一座山上坠落身亡。

sentences.english: Yet Mr Roh was also ill at ease with himself.
sentences.chinese: 而且卢武铉自己真的也不太怡然自得。

definition: Park Chung-Hee (1917-1979), South Korean military man and dictator, president 1963-1979, influential in developing Korean industry, murdered by his bodyguard
Kim Young-sam (1927-), South Korean politician, president 1993-1998
Kim Dae-jung (1926-2009), South Korea politician, president 1998-2003, Nobel peace prize laureate 2000
Lee Myung-bak (1941-), South Korean businessman, one-time chairman of Hyundai, president of South Korea 2008-2013
Roh Tae-woo (1932-), South Korean politician, president 1988-1993
Chun Doo Hwan (1931-), South Korean politician, president 1980-1988
Park Geun-hye (1952-), Korean politician, daughter of former dictator Park Chung-Hee 朴正熙[Piao2 Zheng4 xi1], president of Korea 2013-2017
Blue House (Cheong Wa Dae), residence of the president of South Korea in Seoul
Moon Jae-in (1953-), Korean politician and human rights lawyer, president of Korea from 2017
former president
Syngman Rhee (1875-1965), US trained Korean politician and dictator, president of Republic of Korea 1948-1960
South Korean Grand national party
KOIZUMI Jun'ichirō (1942-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2001-2006
minister of state (old usage)
president (of a country)/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2],屆|届[jie4]
Hwang Jang-yop (1923-2010), North Korean politician known for defecting to South Korea
